txt.en: 'If you plan to continue helping Mossward, I'd happily part with a steed should you desire one.'\n\n<rgb=#00FF00>NOTE: Accepting and completing this quest can only be done once on each server. If you logout before completing this quest, it will be removed from your quest log and you will need to accept it again. This will grant you access to a tutorial quest to introduce you to the LOTRO Store.</rgb>
A Little Extra Never Hurts -- Part 1

The LOTRO Store offers cosmetics, buffs, content access, and a variety of other goodies. Be sure to visit it often to see what's new!\n\n<rgb=#00FF00>Accepting and completing this quest can only be done once on each server. If you logout before completing this quest, it will be removed from your quest log and you will need to accept it again. This will grant you access to a special tutorial quest to introduce you to the LOTRO Store.</rgb>
Talk to Skardi Bendblade in his shop.

Skardi Bendblade is in the blacksmith shop in Mossward.

You should speak with Skardi Bendblade to learn more about his offer.

<rgb=#00FF00>This is a tutorial quest for accessing the web store.</rgb>
